attribute.name: name
attribute.description: The Kameleon Name of the variable.

attribute.name: dataType
attribute.description: The data type of the variable's data.

attribute.name: valid_min
attribute.description: Smallest valid value for a particular variable. If actual value is less than this valid_min, then the actual value is physically impossible and/or was generated in error. This is in type String so that you can see the valid_min along with its corresponding units, in order to doubtlessly understand the boundary.

attribute.name: valid_max
attribute.description: Largest valid value for a particular variable. If actual value is greater than this valid_max, then the actual value is physically impossible and/or generated in error. This is in type String so that you can see the valid_max along with its corresponding units, in order to doubtlessly understand the boundary.

attribute.name: units
attribute.description: the particular units of measurement for a variable

attribute.name: grid_system
attribute.description: grid system in which a variable is on

attribute.name: is_vector_component
attribute.description: int value that identifies if variable is a vector component (1) or scalar variable (0)

attribute.name: position_grid_system
attribute.description: Grid system in which position values are defined if different from actual data grid

attribute.name: data_grid_system
attribute.description: Grid system in which the data is defined

attribute.name: actual_min
attribute.description: Smallest value in the data for a particular variable.

attribute.name: actual_max
attribute.description: Largest value in the data for a particular variable.
